evidence.claim: 365 In-Home Care Solutions ensures compliance with HIPAA guidelines in their operations.
The company mentions adherence to FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare data sharing.
References to HL7 protocol implementations for EHR integration are present.
365 In-Home Care Solutions utilizes various cloud services to enhance their tech stack.
The company discusses their tech infrastructure related to health-tech standards.
